data.title: Fairmont Waterfront
data.meta_description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about Fairmont Waterfront Hotel in Vancouver such as check-in times and pet, cancellation, and reservation policies.
data.text:
Caring for our valued guests and employees is our top priority. To learn more about the extensive measures we are taking to safeguard, protect and care for you, visit Accor’s ALL Safe and Well website.

BOMBAY BEAUTY CO.

Indulge in self-care during your stay. Experience Ayurveda-inspired nature-based beauty and wellness treatments at this on-site salon

Massage services are available upon request in the comfort and privacy of your room.

Please call 604-691-1991 or email [email protected] for more information or to book an appointment.

Overnight parking is available at the hotel and is in effect from 6:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. the next day.

Self parking is available at $58/night. (guests must register license plate at the front desk)

Valet service is available at $75.00/night.

Over-height vehicle parking is available at $125.00/night.

Pricing includes in-and-out privileges and all taxes .

Fairmont Waterfront offers you virtually everything you need to meet your business and convention exhibiting needs — from scanning, copying and faxing to packing and shipping. High-speed wireless internet is also available throughout the hotel.

Location: 2nd Floor

Hours: Access to the Business Centre is complimentary and available 24 hours/day with a guestroom key.

Self Service:

Two work stations

High Speed Internet Access

Printing and copying (black & white only)

ADDITIONAL SERVICES:

Available through Royal Service by dialing ‘0’ or emailing [email protected]

Scanning

Faxing

Colour Printing (charges apply)

We’re delighted to have you and your canine companion staying with us! Cats and dogs (maximum 2) may vacation with you for a $35 per night pet cleaning fee. Dog beds, water bowls and treats for our furry guests are available upon request. Seeing-eye dogs are always welcome.

Please visit our pet-friendly page for more details.

Full laundry service is available seven days a week. In order to guarantee same-day delivery, laundry must be ready 9:00am. Laundry pick-up by the Housekeeping staff starts at 7:00am. Delivery will be done at 6:00pm. Laundry bags are found in the guestroom’s closet.

The Fairmont Waterfront Concierge Desk is located in the Main Lobby. They are happy to help with dinner reservations and recommendations, city tours, theatre and special events, directions, and anything to do with planning your stay in Vancouver! Please contact our dedicated concierge team at 604-691-1997 or via email at [email protected].

To change or cancel a reservation, you must first read the sales conditions for the reserved rate because some rates have specific conditions for changes or cancellations. Visit the Accor website for more information or contact us directly.

Check-in time is 3:00 p.m.

Check-out time is 12:00 NOON

Guests can verify their account balance status and check-out through their television set. A receipt will be mailed out to the address provided by the guest at the time of reservation or check-in.

Caring for our valued guests and employees is our top priority. To learn more about the extensive measures we are taking to safeguard, protect and care for you, visit Accor’s ALL Safe and Well website.

BOMBAY BEAUTY CO.

Indulge in self-care during your stay. Experience Ayurveda-inspired nature-based beauty and wellness treatments at this on-site salon

Over-height vehicle parking is available at $125.00/night.
